comment._content:
Another Bain/LOC photo appears to have been taken on the sidewalk outside the Newport Casino's shops:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4036730661/in/photostream/]

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content:
That building is now the International Tennis Hall of Fame on Bellvue Avenue. I passed it a few months ago while visiting Newport. I recognized it immediately. It still has the canopies, cedar shingles and that rounded archway.

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/richard_arthur_norton/4060205774/]

comment.author: 15283643@N04
comment._content: Nice work Richard! Times sure have changed...
